column2: root]] signifying "express, cause to exude (by pressure)" and is an element in the word ''[[miruvor]]''.<ref name=PE17>{{PE

column1: Note that the root appears to have been rejected by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], who wrote that "this is [[Wikipedia:false etymology
column2: false etymology]] [...] there was not in fact any word ''wor-'' in Elvish, [[Quenya]] or [[Sindarin]]."<ref name=PE17/> One can interpret Tolkien's note in several ways:

column1: *The Elves falsely thought that the latter elements of ''[[miruvor
column2: miruvórë/miruvor]]'' derived from a presumed root WOR.

column1: *Tolkien altogether removed the root WOR (and its relation to ''miruvórë/miruvor'') from the [[legendarium]] .
